translations: 奥林匹克运动会；四年周期

sentences.sentence: After Los Angeles, cities around the world began to vie to host Olympiads.
sentences.translation: 洛杉矶奥运会之后，世界各大城市开始争夺奥运会的主办权。

sentences.sentence: The physics competition is one of the International Science Olympiads held around the world.
sentences.translation: 该物理竞赛是在世界各地举行的国际科学奥林匹克竞赛的之一。

sentences.sentence: Whereas in earlier Olympiads Americans shone mostly in track and field, in Paris they took the lead in almost every venue.
sentences.translation: 在往届奥运会上，美国人士多在田径项目上独领风骚，而在巴黎他们几乎在所有项目上居领先地位。
